ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Bring your Book, then, if you are telling the truth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then bring your scripture, if what you say is true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Bring your Book, if you are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Bring your book if what you say is true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Then bring forth your Book, if you are truthful!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then bring your Book if you are truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then bring your book, if you are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Bring your Book, if you speak truly!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then produce your writ, if ye are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then produce your scriptures, if you are telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then bring your book, if ye say sooth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then produce your scripture, should you be truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then bring ye your Book (of authority) if ye be truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then bring your Book if you are truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Bring your Book, if what you say is true!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then bring your book, if you are telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:157] Then produce your scripture, the Torah, and show Me this [as it is mentioned] in it, if you are being truthful, about this statement of yours.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then produce your writ, if ye are truthful) that the angels are Allah's daughters.
